text: You may not recognize this Kevin Falk with all of his clothing on, but in fact, the famous porn star was featured in a recent music video. According to Billboard, the Randy Blue actor was hired to play one of Taylor Swift's bodyguards in her latest music video for ` ` Delicate.'' If you don't remember Kevin, he is best known for his work on the aforementioned gay porn site, acting under aliases like Danny Hart, Jim Jupiter, Memphis Blake, and Jim Jojo. Songstress Taylor Swift Hires Second Gay Porn Star for a Music Video : Details Source : rttnews This is not the 28 - year - old singer's first time dipping into the porn pool for her music video extras.
